actions.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.
On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 205 - 203 (Roll no. 478).
On agreeing to the amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: (Roll No. 490).

description: Amendment adds language consisting of the "DC Parental Choice Incentive Act of 2003".
purpose: An amendment to authorize a school voucher program in the District of Columbia. Students will be eligible for up to $7500 in funds to attend a private elementary or high school in the District. Eligible students must be residents of the District and their family income could not exceed 185% of the federal poverty level.
